liveOnly.label: Live Only Mode
liveOnly.tooltip: True if you want it to only run when you are live

helpCommand.label: Help command
helpCommand.tooltip: List the conditions or the list of sound commands

permission.label: Help permission
permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the help command

soundPermission.label: Play sound permission
soundPermission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the sound commands

volume.label: Volume
volume.tooltip: Set the volume power for the playing sounds.

onCooldown.value: {user}, {command} is still on cooldown for {cd} minutes!
onCooldown.label: Cooldown Response
onCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 {user} = Username
 {cd} = time remaining

onUserCooldown.value: {user}, {command} is still on user cooldown for {cd} minutes!
onUserCooldown.label: User Cooldown Response
onUserCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 {user} = Username
 {cd} = time remaining

commandsSeparator.label: Sound commands Separator
commandsSeparator.tooltip:
The separator that will be used for the {avail_sound_commands} parameter. 
 Ex.1 with ' - ': !kids - !boo 
 Ex.2 with ', ' : !kids, !boo

permitedResponse.label: Playlist
permitedResponse.tooltip: Message that shows all available sound commands.

notPermitedResponse.label: Playlist
notPermitedResponse.tooltip: Message that shows the conditions that you must fill to use the sound commands
